job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongSoftware Engineerstrongppbrppstrong strongAs a Software Engineer youll help develop the next generation platform that will support all our products Youll share your skills innovation and experience with a team of talented engineers guiding the way on software design and best practices and helping to solve some of our most challenging technical problems Youll find yourself able to stretch and grow in almost any direction you choose while building a data analytics experience that will delight users and directly impact the bottom line Along the way youll be working with friendly people who are as passionate about software as you areppbrppIf the following sounds like you we want to talkpulliYoure a great programmer highly skilled in frontend and backend development using technologies like React and NodeJSliliYou know TypeScript or another strongly typed languagelili Youre passionate about clean code You understand that the code you write today will need to be read by developers in the futureliliYou can roll up your sleeves supporting the development of deployment pipelines using tools like Kubernetes Docker amp Gitlab CICDliliYou are a coach and mentor to other developers a thought leader in code reviews and software designliliYoure passionate about building great experiences that delight customers and are selfmotivated to get it doneliliYou believe in automated testing  if it doesnt have tests it isnt done lili You believe in taking ownership of what you build  if it breaks you fix itlili Youre a great collaborator and a lifelong
